description: Delete event that is no longer on the calendar (already removed). Tests idempotent success when event is already gone.

mock_llm_response.summary: No actionable events found. The vendor demo was already cancelled by Carol.

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18. Calendar context does NOT contain any vendor demo event - it was already removed. The LLM should recognize there is nothing to delete and return no events. Relaxed tolerance because some LLMs might still emit a delete action.
